ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry you took my reply to your Goonda example as a personal attack.  To me this is a game of optimization.  How do I optimize my time to level/get items
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry you took my reply to your Goonda example as a
personal attack. To me this is a game of optimization. How
do I optimize my time to level/get items faster? How do I
optimize my songs/attacks to let me kill harder stuff? The
time it takes me to run back to my corpse vs. getting bound
closer is just another factor for me to optimize.

Given your avowed hatred for running through the zone naked to
get back to your corpse, I'd assume it would've been obvious
the best way to minimize your time doing that would be to
first get bound closer, even if it took an hour to find
someone to bind you.

The silly thing is I completely agree with you that I see no
reason for having a difference between what zones binders and
non-binders can bind at.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
